features: Scrub It Away: MARLOWE. deep cleansing bar soap for men uses apricot seed powder and ground pumice to buff away dryness for smooth, clean skin. These mens soap bars gently lift away dirt and rough skin without stripping natural moisture, with the support of Shea Butter & Olive oil to aid in moisturization

3 Amazing Scents: This bundle has 3 bath soap scents! The Original soap bar features agarwood, sandalwood and musk. Oud Wood bar provides an earthy scent of smoked birch & cardamom, while the Santal soap bar has warm layers of amber, spice and citron
Experience The MARLOWE. Difference: Our vegan body scrub soap is designed to nourish, smooth and revitalize skin. Experience the 3 amazing scents and pick your favorite MARLOWE. scrub soap

No Bad Stuff & Made Right Here: RSPO Certified,SLS/SLES and Paraben and phthalate-free, glycerin-based, cruelty-free and made in the USA. Bath soap wrapper made from 100% post-consumer recycled paper, FSC certified

The MARLOWE. Man: Men need hair & skin care too, but it doesn't have to be complicated. We believe that life is complicated enough. Looking good and feeling amazing shouldn’t have to be. MARLOWE. engineers products that work as hard as you do
body.description: "Marlowe. No. 102 Men's Body Scrub Soap, Variety Trio, 3 Fresh Scents, Original, Oud Wood & SantalWe welcome you to a new world of cleanliness and superior grooming capabilities. The best part? MARLOWE. is as effortless to use as it is effective. Look forward to your daily grooming routine and feel invigorated before facing the day. At night, come home to products tough enough to scrub away the day and replenish for tomorrow.Natural IngredientsIf this sounds like something you didn’t know you needed, then you are definitely in the right place. This deep cleansing, exfoliating body soap uses apricot seed powder & ground pumice to buff away dryness for smooth, clean skin. The unique formulation of shea butter, passionflower fruit, green tea,& willow bark extracts in our natural soap bars offers high moisture, skin-soothing properties, skin restoration, and skin protection.Free from Harsh ChemicalsAt MARLOWE. our no-nonsense products are free from harsh chemicals like phthalates, SLS/SLES and parabens. Cruelty-free (never tested on animals) and are made right here in the USA. So, taking care of skin is no longer needed to be complicated. MARLOWE. engineers products that work as hard as you do."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to bar soap
reviews.reviewText: Love the Marlowe line. Smells great. Leaves your skin hydrated so I'm not itchy after my shower anymore like a lot of soaps seem to make me. The exfoliating bar is my favorite. Just the right roughness, you feel clean and smell great. The only soap I use now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this soap, can’t say enough great things about it. Great smell, exfoliating, long lasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scrubby soap with a rough, clean feel
reviews.reviewText: I like to scrub, it makes me feel clean. This soap scrubs. The texture is rough, but it feels good when I soap up my body. It doesn’t dry out my skin, but exfoliates so I don’t have dead skin hanging around. I feel fresh and clean and a little pink after my shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Feels so good- great scrub. Now, any face cloth becomes a loofah. The scents are great, suds up really nicely, rinses off completely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good bar of soap
reviews.reviewText: Not the best soap I have ever used, but close enough for the price. It lathers great and smells good. I wish the bar would last a little longer, but it does outlast a Dr. Squatch bar of soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exfoliates and Smells great
reviews.reviewText: My fiancé bought these and we have never looked back. Great scents and scrubs just enough, it could lather more, and maybe last a little longer. However we don’t think we need to look any further, we still love this soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good soap!
reviews.reviewText: It’s excellent for getting the sweat and grime off after working outside in the heat and humidity. It’s a good size: big enough to last longer, but not so oversized that you can’t hang on to it easily. It’s a little rough when you rub the bar directly on your skin, but I like that for knees and elbows. It also removed the dead flaky skin from my sunburned arms. If you lather it up in your hands you can wash anywhere else you don’t want the abrasive effect. I’m completely satisfied with this product. I would prefer a lower price, but I’m willing to pay what higher quality costs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite soap
reviews.reviewText: Great scent and does the job
